extension_description.message: Play YouTube playlist in reverse order

text_feedback.description: Encourage users leaving reviews on chrome web store
text_feedback.message: Leave some comments and rate 5 stars in Chrome Web Store, if you enjoy playing YouTube playlist in reverse order with Reverse Playlist for YouTube.

text_support.message: Any issues please submit to Support Page on CWS or email to reverseplaylistforyoutube@alvinhkh.com (in English)

text_tweet.message: Reverse Playlist for YouTube, awesome extension that play playlist in reverse order.

title_share.description: Encourage sharing extension on social media
title_share.message: Share this extension with your friends so they can play YouTube playlist in reverse order like you :)
